feed.title: My Bootstrap 5 Jekyll Theme
feed.subtitle: A basic Jekyll theme with Bootstrap 5 and nice cards.

entry.title: Welcome to Bootstrap 5 Jekyll!
entry.content:
This is your first post with the new Bootstrap 5 Jekyll theme. It features a responsive design and uses Bootstrap cards to display posts on the homepage. You can edit this post in _posts/2025-07-08-welcome-to-jekyll.markdown.

Features:

  • Bootstrap 5: Modern and responsive design framework.
  • Jekyll: Simple, blog-aware, static site generator.
  • Cards: Clean and organized display of content.

Enjoy building your website!
entry.summary: This is your first post with the new Bootstrap 5 Jekyll theme. It features a responsive design and uses Bootstrap cards to display posts on the homepage. You can edit this post in _posts/2025-07-08-welcome-to-jekyll.markdown.
